summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of West Roxbury Street from 17th Avenue Southwest to 35th Avenue Southwest, and certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, as authorized by Ordinance No. 89145, creating Local Improvement District No. 6226, and amending Section 4 of said ordinance to declare that the period during which the local improvement district bonds are payable will not exceed the life of said improvement.
